sub_title: Manager of The Netherlands Industry at RINA
summary:
Mr Gentile is Technical Leader of the SW Engineering and Cybersecurity unit part of the Space and Defence division. The unit’s main activities are related to space and defence applications, with a special focus on security. 

Mr Gentile daily activities are identifiable on the following macro sections:
▪ Project and Team Management:  definition of project proposal, identification of project risks, project budget, team member composition, resources allocation to tasks and work packages, project plan definition, project monitoring and project status reporting. Mr Gentile is also involved in the contractual management of the project as support to the accounting and administration services, concerning invoicing. 

▪ Security: definition of security policies, security risk analysis, definition of security requirements and design of security systems implementation (including the identification of existing countermeasures or design of ad-hoc measures supported by security operation procedures). Mr Gentile is also involved in IT Security performing analyses according to the OWASP guidelines.  Mr Gentile is able to support customers in the whole process of certification of systems according to the standards: ISO/IEC 27001, ISO 15408 (Common Criteria) and ITSEC.

▪ SW Engineering: support to customer in gathering, analysis and definition of SW requirements (e.g. functional, operational, etc), definition of software architecture (e.g. best platform, software modelling, etc), verification and validation activities (including both the definition and performance of the tests), delivery process and support following the delivery.

▪ Business Development: identification of potential customers, presentation of competencies and expertise, identification of company fit towards customer needs, preparation of technical and financial proposals and coordination of large consortia.
